body: So summer is two days away for me! And after that I will move on to...DA DA DA DAAAAA, High School! So what are you guys planning to do during summer? PS, I know not all of you are having summer because different hemispheres and stoof, but tell me your plans! I'll be taking photography, and hanging out with my family, etc. :3

replies.body: :c does the cold bother you ;3 get the reference anyone?
